downloadTitle: Fraunhofer Report - The Impact of Internet Browsers on Computer Energy Consumption
downloadDescription: In this study, Fraunhofer USA finds that Internet Explorer 10 is the most energy efficient browser on Windows 8.

downloadFile.name: FhCSE - The Impact of Internet Browsers on Computer Energy Consumption.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/2/0/7204397b-df32-4c97-a86c-c06f55000992/FhCSE - The Impact of Internet Browsers on Computer Energy Consumption.pdf

detailsSection: Report of the study conducted by Center for Sustainable Energy Systems, Fraunhofer USA Inc., an independent research organization, at Microsoft’s request, to study the impact of web browsers on power draw and energy consumption of computers.
detailsSection_file_name: FhCSE - The Impact of Internet Browsers on Computer Energy Consumption.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: This guide is available in PDF format. To access the file. you will need Adobe Reader or a compatible PDF reader.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button and open the file directly or save it to your local machine for future reference.
